message_1: Suppose you intercepted the following Playfair cipher message: "LQ CK CH KT TC DG" and you know that it was encrypted using the Playfair cipher algorithm. Decrypt the message to reveal the original plaintext message.
message_2: To decrypt a Playfair cipher message, we need to know the keyword used to generate the 5x5 matrix. Without the keyword, it is impossible to decrypt the message accurately. Please provide the keyword, and I will decrypt the message for you.
